title: Ep 33 | The Art of Ignoring the Truth | Guest: Eric Metaxas
description:
While Jase is out of town, Phil and Al speak with author Eric Metaxas about his faith journey and how many universities today are teaching students how to ignore God because they don’t have a better answer.

Get a FREE Moto Z3 when you open a new line. Visit PartiotMobile.com/Blaze
